item.title: Sonic Detectives Want to Help SpaceX Listen Up
item.description: Physicists who record rocket launches and landings are learning important facts about the acoustics of spaceflight.

item.title: Charles B. Rangel, Longtime Harlem Congressman, Dies at 94
item.description: As the dean of New York’s delegation and the first Black chairman of the House Ways and Means Committee, he was a powerful political force for decades...

item.title: Memorial Day Storms Cause Delays for Holiday Travelers
item.description: Thunderstorms in the south and central United States caused flight delays during Memorial Day weekend, the beginning of the summer travel season.
